author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Due to the fact that the State of New York is dedicated to the pursuit of making sure no human is illegal, Kathy Hochul has failed New Yorkers and turned a blind eye to innocent victims solely because that is the politically correct thing to do.

This is why Rep. Elise Stefanik said what needed to be said, as she blasted Hochul for her policies that embolden criminal aliens, while slapping the fact of law-abiding citizens everywhere.

MUST WATCH: @RepStefanik TORCHES
title: GOP Rep TORCHES failed NY Governor over her incompetence: "No amount of words is going to clean up your failed record"

author: Danielle Berjikian
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

If you're going to tug at the public's heartstrings by promoting a new face for food stamps, the least you could do is avoid exploiting someone who clearly isn’t struggling to put food on the table. And while we are never, and I mean NEVER, here to fat shame, someone should really give Amy Klobuchar that message.

Klobuchar posted a video of a mom claiming she’s been struggling to make ends meet and has relied on SNAP benefits for what’s implied to be up to 21 years. And in her very first breath, we see some of the glaring issues with how these benefits are used.

This post does not send the me
title: Democrats think this woman's sob story about food stamps will make you feel bad, don't realize why it won't

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

There has been a refreshing lack of videos of drag queens preying on children this Pride month. However, there were a few drag queens preying on Donald Trump last night at the Kennedy Center. A couple of dudes were going to be at the same performance of Les Misérables, so they decided to dress in women's clothing because they...thought it would trigger Donald Trump? Or at the very least trigger JD Vance?

If I'm being straight with you (no pun intended), I haven't had the bandwidth to pay attention to any of the Kennedy Center drama. Trump named himself Chairman. Leftist actors boycotted and/or whined about it. At some point, Trump said, “Just last year, the
title: Drag queens show up to "defy" Donald Trump at Kennedy Center performance, as if Trump gives a s***

author: Brodigan
description:
Watch Louder with Crowder every weekday at 11:00 AM Eastern, only on Rumble Premium!

Ya know what's even funnier than David Hogg getting a leadership position in the DNC because some in the party felt more Hogg would help attract male voters? Removing David from said leadership position for no other reason than he's both a male and identifies as one. Yes, in a vote conducted by a group of party elitists, Hogg's election as vice chair has been nullified. Side note, a poll circulating on X yesterday gave Democrats an approval rating of only 21%.

To set the stage for what happened, listen to this cisegendered white man calling Democrats a threat to Democracy:
title: LOL: Democrats just fired David Hogg over a silly "diversity" quota, and you almost feel bad for him (almost, not quite)
